Title: The new generation grows up in happiness
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Photographs showing the improved conditions for Chinese youngsters growing up after Liberation. The series focusses on Shanghai. Here showing children sketching in nature; taking part in cleaning activities; honoring Dou Shaoyi (窦少毅), a veteran from the People's Volunteers fighting in Korea; taking with a teacher.
Theme: Early Campaigns (1949-1954)Models and MartyrsForeign Friends: North Korea
